block.powertool.item_supplier.tooltip: In creative mode, right-click to put held items in. In other modes, left-click or right-click to get unlimited items out.
block.powertool.cosmetic_campfire.toolti: No functionality, safe for buildings. Cannot be used as a signal fire.
block.powertool.cosmetic_soul_campfire.t: No functionality, safe for buildings. Cannot be used as a signal fire.
